6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: Khalid bin Dinar Abu Khaldah said:"I heard Anas bin Malik say: 'When it was hot, the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) would wait until it cooled down to pray, and when it was cold he would hasten to pray

chapter.eng-name: Praying Zuhr Earlier When It Is Cold
